category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA122_download_dlg_conflicting_local_files_selection_mode
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to configure the default behavior of the document selector dialog for download operations when a local copy of the file previously downloaded from Teamcenter exists. Possible values: 0 - no action: prompts the user to choose between retaining or overwriting the local copy (Default) 1 - select automatically the file in order to overwrite the local copy 2 - do not select the file in order to retain the local copy
